column4: baseless, no. you haven't read the articles i've read lately, so i guess it's hard to understand where i'm coming from. i can understand and appreciate and apologize for that. i've been reading a lot, a LOT of techno articles that basically are pointing out problems with new devices, either in hardware functionality or software compatibility with the users need.
it's a growing trend i've noticed and it's a little disturbing. that's all.
